      • getMyStudyProtocol

        public static java.lang.String getMyStudyProtocol​(matrix.db.Context context,
                                                  java.util.Map<?,​?> mpParamMAP)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        The method creates the JSON object to get the list of Study Protocol associated with the user. the input parameters are:
        Parameters:
        context - The enovia Context object
        args - the type, name, revision and where clause,allowed state can be configured and sent as input to get the desired list of the objects to be displayed
        Returns:
        JSON object consisting of the information to be displayed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When operation fails

      • disconnectAndConnect

        public static com.matrixone.apps.domain.DomainRelationship disconnectAndConnect​(matrix.db.Context context,
                                                                                java.lang.String objectId,
                                                                                matrix.util.StringList disconnectObjectId,
                                                                                matrix.util.StringList connectObjectId,
                                                                                java.lang.String relationship,
                                                                                boolean isFromside)
                                                                         throws matrix.util.MatrixException
        Common method for disconnect and connect a) Disconnects the objectId with the given relationship and with from/to disconnectObjectId b) Connects tht objectId with the given relationship and with from/to connectObjectId
        Parameters:
        context - the matrix context
        objectId - the objectId
        disconnectObjectId - the objectId to be disconnected
        connectObjectId - the objectId to be connected
        strRelationship - the relationship
        isFromside - true if the objectId is from side
        Returns:
        DomainRelationship new DomainRealtionship
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if operation fails
        matrix.util.MatrixException
